title: Southbound trains from Ang Mo Kio to Bishan moving slower due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 南行列车从宏茂桥到碧山因轨道故障运行速度减慢
title_translations.ms: Kereta api arah selatan dari Ang Mo Kio ke Bishan bergerak lebih perlahan kerana kerosakan trek
title_translations.ta: Ang Mo Kio முதல் Bishan வரையிலான தெற்கு நோக்கிச் செல்லும் ரயில்கள் தடப் பிழை காரணமாக மெதுவாகச் செல்கின்றன

updates.text: UPDATE:Southbound trains from Ang Mo Kio to Bishan running well again.
Update:Southbound train service from Ang Mo Kio to Bishan moving slower due to track fault.
UPDATE:Southbound train service from Yio Chu Kang to Bishan moving slower. Expect 5mins delay.
Southbound trains from Ang Mo Kio to Bishan moving slower due to track fault.
